title: ScaleCUA: Scaling Open-Source Computer Use Agents with Cross-Platform Data
summary: This work introduces ScaleCUA, a step toward scaling open-source computer use agents (CUAs) by offering a large-scale dataset spanning 6 operating systems and 3 task domains. The dataset is built via a closed-loop pipeline uniting automated agents with human experts, addressing the limitation of lacking large-scale, open-source computer use data and foundation models.
usefulness_reason: This paper introduces a "large-scale dataset" for computer use agents, built with "human experts". This is highly relevant to "Contextual dataset" and could be considered a form of "Survey data" if the human expert input is gathered through a survey-like process.
